heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on this journey of healing and self-discovery.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media to stay updated on the latest news, events, and inspiring content about healing and spiritual growth.

chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I am here to help you on your healing path. How can I assist you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancient Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew prepared from the decoction of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). This unique combination not only opens the doors to deep introspection but has also been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a biochemical and spiritual level. Chacruna contains Dimethyltryptamine (DMT), a visionary molecule that our own brain produces. The Ayahuasca vine contains monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), which allow DMT to be orally active. This synergy facilitates an expanded state of consciousness, allowing you to access deep memories, heal traumas, and receive guidance from within.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher or a plant intelligence that guides each participant on a unique and personalized journey. It works with love and wisdom, showing you exactly what you need to see for your healing and growth. Each ceremony is an intimate dialogue with this ancestral wisdom.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a clear vision of your life path, your relationships, and your behavioral patterns. Ayahuasca helps you understand your purpose and make decisions aligned with your true self.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release deep-seated traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. The ceremony provides a safe space to process and heal past wounds, allowing you to live with more freedom and joy.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of connection with yourself, with others, and with the universe. Ayahuasca dissolves the barriers of the ego, revealing the interconnectedness of all life.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a supportive and trusting environment. Group ceremonies amplify the experience, allowing for collective learning and a deep sense of community. Ideal for those seeking connection and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and fully personalized experience, designed to address your specific intentions. Perfect for those seeking deep immersion and exclusive accompaniment in their healing process. Ideal for couples or individuals.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a profound and safe experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: We accompany you at every step of your journey.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space for introspection and healing.
experienceProcessDescription: A unique journey guided by the wisdom of the medicine.
integrationProcessDescription: Incorporate the teachings into your daily life for lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: Prepare your body as a sacred temple. A clean and conscious diet is essential to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: • Fresh fruits and vegetables • Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats) • Legumes • Grilled or steamed fish • Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: • Red and processed meats • Dairy and fermented products • Refined sugars and spicy foods • Caffeine and alcohol • Fried or greasy foods
mentalPrepSubtitle: Intention is the compass of your journey. Prepare your mind to receive with openness and trust.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate presence.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal, understand, or transform. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to note your thoughts, fears, and expectations.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring suppressed emotions to the surface. Trust the process and allow yourself to feel. Emotional release is a powerful part of healing. We are here to hold you with compassion and without judgment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList: • Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers) • Blanket and pillow • Water bottle • Journal and pen
essentialsList: • Open mind and heart • Clear intentions • Trust in the process and the guides

exportDataDescription: Create a backup of all main database collections into a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the database from a JSON file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all current application data with the contents of the backup file. An automatic backup will be created before importing. Are you sure you want to continue?
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was created just before your last import. If something went wrong, you can revert to the previous state.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the pre-import state.
rollbackWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all current data with the backup created before your last import. Are you sure?
